roleset.name: disagree

role.descr: a person engaged in a quarrel

example.name: Arg2 as with-PP
example.text: Even some takeover-stock traders said [0] they could n't quarrel with the board 's logic .

example.name: Arg2 as over-PP
example.text: After years of [*]-1 quarreling over Bonn 's `` Ostpolitik '' , [West Germany and the U.S.]-1 appear [*-1] to have shifted onto a united course in Eastern Europe .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'quarrel' based on automatic expansion through verbnet and WSJ; nominal 'quarreling' based on BOLT-6.

example.name: nominal rel: quarreling
example.text: Paul called the Corinthians worldly because of their quarreling over whom they were following.
